content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5) (status: WORKING)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) (status: WORKING, fuel: 42 coal)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) (status: WORKING, connected to power network)
- Power network (id=5262) now active

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills (all powered, outputting downward):
  - (15.5, 70.5) - output blocked warning
  - (18.5, 70.5) - output blocked warning
  - (21.5, 70.5) - output blocked warning
  - (24.5, 70.5) - output blocked warning
  - (27.5, 70.5) - output blocked warning
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (25.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (28.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 65.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (19.0, 65.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (25.0, 65.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (28.0, 65.0) - status: NO_FUEL
- Ore collection system with:
  - 5 Burner inserters at drill outputs (positions 15.5-27.5, 72.5)
  - 5 Wooden chests at (15.5-27.5, 73.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues (continued)
- Secondary power plant now operational after fixing fuel and connections
- Verify all mining drills have proper power connections

### Entity Placement Conflicts (continued)
- Repeated attempts to place chests at occupied positions (15.5, 73.5)
- Failed inserter placement due to blocked positions (15.5, 71.5)
- Always check for existing entities before placement attempts
- Clear space before attempting to place new entities

### Production Chain Problems (continued)
- All furnaces still showing "no ingredients" despite powered drills
- Drills showing "output blocked" warnings
- Verify inserter connections between drills and furnaces
- Check belt/inserter configurations for proper material flow

### Inventory Management (continued)
- Multiple failed attempts to insert coal due to full inventories (50/50 items)
- Inserters failing due to full inventories
- Monitor inventory levels before insertion operations
- Implement proper inventory management checks

### Distance Placement Errors (continued)
- Attempted chest placement from too far away (distance 75.12)
- Always move within placement range (max 10 tiles) before attempting placement

### Inserter Configuration (continued)
- Inserters showing "waiting for source items" despite available outputs
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions are correctly aligned
- Check inserter fuel levels for burner inserters

### Attribute Access Errors (new)
- Attempted to access non-existent 'inventory' attribute on burner inserters
- Verify correct API usage for entity types before accessing attributes
- Check documentation for proper attribute names per entity type
